apis.name: Shanghai Stock Exchange API
apis.description: Shanghai Stock Exchange provides market data access through authorized distributors and the Oriental Express (东方快车) project for high-speed market data feeds.
unique_features: Oriental Express open-source API project for high-speed market access
FAST (FAST Application Switch Technology) market data protocol
15-second publication frequency for real-time data
C and Java API versions available
Direct access to SSE internal high-speed market data platforms

endpoints.description: High-speed market data feed access through Oriental Express project

documentation_sections.code_examples: GitHub repository with C and Java examples
documentation_sections.sdks_libraries: C API and Java API available

pricing.free_tier: Open source Oriental Express project available

paid_tiers.name: Commercial License
paid_tiers.description: Commercial use requires authorization from Shanghai Stock Exchange

pricing.pricing_notes: Real-time data requires licensing through China Investment Information Services Limited (CIIS)

compliance.data_licensing: Licensed through CIIS for overseas distribution

apis.name: Shenzhen Stock Exchange API
apis.description: Shenzhen Stock Exchange data access primarily through third-party providers and financial data vendors, with no direct public API currently available.
unique_features: Focus on SME and growth companies
ChiNext board for innovative companies
SME board for small and medium enterprises
Integration with mainland China trading systems

endpoints.description: Data access through licensed information vendors

documentation_sections.getting_started: Contact SZSE or licensed data vendors

pricing.free_tier: Limited free delayed data through some vendors

paid_tiers.name: Real-time Data
paid_tiers.description: Real-time market data through licensed providers

pricing.pricing_notes: Pricing varies by data vendor and usage requirements

data_quality.data_delay: Real-time to 20+ minutes depending on vendor

access_requirements.restrictions: Subject to vendor terms and Chinese regulations

apis.name: Hong Kong Stock Exchange API (HKEX)
apis.provider: Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing Limited (HKEX)
apis.description: HKEX provides market data through multiple channels including OMD (Orion Market Data) feeds, FINI API for IPO data, and various real-time and historical data services.
unique_features: FINI (Fast Interface for New Issuance) API for IPO data
OMD (Orion Market Data) real-time feeds
Multi-level data products (Standard, Premium, FullTick)
End-to-end encryption for sensitive data
JWT-based authentication system
Comprehensive derivatives market coverage

endpoints.description: IPO reference data and new issuance information

paid_tiers.name: OMD Securities Standard (SS)
paid_tiers.description: Standard level real-time securities market data

paid_tiers.name: OMD Securities Premium (SP)
paid_tiers.description: Premium level with additional market depth

pricing.pricing_notes: Pricing varies by data type, usage, and redistribution rights

access_requirements.registration: Required for FINI API and data licensing
access_requirements.restrictions: Subject to HKEX market data policies

support.official_support: HKEX customer support and technical assistance

compliance.regulatory: Complies with Hong Kong securities regulations

apis.name: Japan Exchange Group API (JPX)
apis.description: JPX provides market data through multiple APIs including J-Quants API for retail investors, TDnet API for disclosure information, and Last Sales Information API for institutional users.
unique_features: J-Quants API specifically designed for retail investors
TDnet API for real-time disclosure information
Comprehensive historical data going back decades
Integration with Japanese corporate disclosure system
Multi-language support (Japanese/English)
Educational focus for retail investor data literacy

endpoints.description: Daily stock price data with historical splits and dividends

documentation_sections.authentication: API key registration through J-Quants portal

paid_tiers.name: Light Plan
paid_tiers.description: Real-time daily data with extended historical coverage

paid_tiers.name: Standard Plan
paid_tiers.description: Intraday data, real-time updates, and comprehensive datasets

paid_tiers.name: Premium Plan
paid_tiers.description: Full real-time access, complete historical data, and all features

pricing.pricing_notes: Educational discounts available, institutional pricing on request

data_quality.update_frequency: Real-time to daily depending on plan
data_quality.data_delay: Real-time to 12 weeks depending on plan

access_requirements.restrictions: Usage subject to JPX terms of service

support.documentation_quality: Very high - comprehensive guides and examples
support.community: Active user community and educational resources

compliance.data_licensing: Clear licensing terms for different use cases
compliance.redistribution: Specific terms for data redistribution by plan

apis.name: Singapore Exchange API (SGX)
apis.description: SGX provides market data access through real-time price feeds, delayed price APIs, and connectivity solutions for Singapore securities and derivatives markets.
unique_features: SGX Data Source API for delayed market data
Real-time price feeds with ultra-low latency
Comprehensive derivatives market coverage
QUEST trading engine integration
Multi-asset class coverage
Southeast Asian market focus

endpoints.description: Delayed market data for SGX securities and derivatives

documentation_sections.authentication: Contact SGX for API access credentials

paid_tiers.name: Real-time Market Data
paid_tiers.description: Real-time price feeds with low latency

paid_tiers.name: Premium Data Services
paid_tiers.description: Full market depth, historical data, and analytics

pricing.pricing_notes: Pricing based on data usage, user count, and redistribution rights

data_quality.reliability: Very high - direct from SGX trading engine
data_quality.data_delay: Real-time to 20 minutes depending on license

access_requirements.authentication: API key and additional authentication for real-time data
access_requirements.restrictions: Subject to SGX market data policy and licensing terms

support.documentation_quality: Good - professional documentation for licensed users
support.official_support: SGX customer support and technical assistance

compliance.redistribution: Specific terms for data redistribution and display

research_notes: Shanghai Stock Exchange primarily provides data access through the Oriental Express open-source project and licensed distributors rather than direct public APIs
Shenzhen Stock Exchange does not offer direct public API access, with data available through third-party licensed vendors
Hong Kong Stock Exchange offers the most comprehensive API ecosystem with FINI API for IPO data and extensive OMD feed products
Japan Exchange Group provides the most retail investor-friendly API through J-Quants, with clear pricing and educational focus
Singapore Exchange offers both delayed and real-time API access but requires licensing for most commercial use cases
All exchanges require proper licensing and compliance with local financial regulations for commercial data redistribution
Real-time data access typically requires significant licensing fees and regulatory compliance across all exchanges
research_limitations: Some API documentation is not publicly available and requires direct contact with exchanges
Pricing information is often quote-based and not publicly disclosed
Chinese exchanges have limited English documentation available
Access requirements can be complex and vary significantly between retail and institutional users
